verses.t: I say{G3004} the truth{G225} in{G1722} Christ{G5547}, I lie{G5574} not{G3756}, my{G3450} conscience{G3588} also bearing{G4828} me{G3427} witness{G4828} in{G1722} the Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151},

Not{G3756} as though{G3634} the word{G3588} of God{G3588} hath taken none effect{G1601}. For{G1063} they{G3778} are not{G3756} all{G3956} Israel{G2474}, which are{G3588} of{G1537} Israel{G2474}:

Neither{G3761}, because{G3754} they are{G1526} the seed{G4690} of Abraham{G11}, are they all{G3956} children{G5043}: but{G235}, In{G1722} Isaac{G2464} shall{G2564} thy{G4671} seed{G4690} be called{G2564}.

And{G1161} not{G3756} only{G3440} this; but{G235} when{G2192} Rebecca{G4479} also{G2532} had{G2192} conceived{G2845} by{G1537} one{G1520}, even by{G3588} our{G2257} father{G3962} Isaac{G2464};

(For{G1063} the children being{G1080} not yet{G3380} born{G1080}, neither{G3366} having done{G4238} any{G5100} good{G18} or{G2228} evil{G2556}, that{G2443} the purpose{G4286} of God{G3588} according to{G2596} election{G1589} might stand{G3306}, not{G3756} of{G1537} works{G2041}, but{G235} of{G1537} him that calleth{G2564};)
It was said{G4483} unto her{G846}, The elder{G3187} shall serve{G1398} the younger{G1640}.
As{G2531} it is written{G1125}, Jacob{G2384} have I loved{G25}, but{G1161} Esau{G2269} have I hated{G3404}.
What{G5101} shall we say{G2046} then{G3767}? Is there unrighteousness{G93} with{G3844} God{G3588}? God forbid{G1096}.
For{G1063} he saith{G3004} to Moses{G3475}, I will have mercy on{G1653} whom{G3739} I will have mercy{G1653}, and{G2532} I will have compassion on{G3627} whom{G3739} I will have compassion{G3627}.
So{G686} then{G3767} it is not{G3756} of him that willeth{G2309}, nor{G3761} of him that runneth{G5143}, but{G235} of God{G2316} that sheweth mercy{G1653}.

For{G1063} the scripture{G3588} saith{G3004} unto Pharaoh{G5328}, Even for{G1519} this{G5124} same{G846} purpose{G5124} have I raised{G1825} thee{G4571} up{G1825}, that{G3704} I might shew{G1731} my{G3450} power{G3588} in{G1722} thee{G4671}, and{G2532} that{G3704} my{G3450} name{G3588} might be declared{G1229} throughout{G1722} all{G3956} the earth{G3588}.
Therefore{G3767} hath he mercy on{G1653} whom{G3739} he will{G2309} have mercy, and{G1161} whom{G3739} he will{G2309} he hardeneth{G4645}.
Thou wilt say{G2046} then{G3767} unto me{G3427}, Why{G5101} doth he{G3201} yet{G2089} find fault{G3201}? For{G1063} who{G5101} hath resisted{G436}his{G846} will{G1013}?

Nay but{G3304}, O{G5599} man{G444}, who{G5101} art{G1488} thou{G4771} that repliest against{G470} God{G3588}? Shall{G2046} the thing formed{G3588} say{G2046} to him that formed{G4111} it, Why{G5101} hast thou made{G4160} me{G3165} thus{G3779}?

Hath{G2192} not{G3756} the potter{G3588} power{G1849} over the clay{G3588}, of{G1537} the same{G846} lump{G5445} to make{G4160} one{G3303} vessel{G4632} unto{G1519} honour{G5092}, and{G1161} another{G3739} unto{G1519} dishonour{G819}?

What if{G1487} God{G3588}, willing{G2309} to shew{G1731} his wrath{G3588}, and{G2532} to make{G1107} his{G846} power{G1415} known{G1107}, endured{G5342} with{G1722} much{G4183} longsuffering{G3115} the vessels{G4632} of wrath{G3709} fitted{G2675} to{G1519} destruction{G684}:

And{G2532} that{G2443} he might make known{G1107} the riches{G3588} of his{G846} glory{G3588} on{G1909} the vessels{G4632} of mercy{G1656}, which{G3739} he had afore prepared{G4282} unto{G1519} glory{G1391},

Esaias{G2268} also{G1161} crieth{G2896} concerning{G5228} Israel{G2474}, Though{G1437} the number{G3588} of the children{G3588} of Israel{G2474} be{G5600} as{G5613} the sand{G3588} of the sea{G3588}, a remnant{G3588} shall be saved{G4982}:

For{G1063} he will finish{G4931} the work{G3056}, and{G2532} cut{G4932} it short{G4932} in{G1722} righteousness{G1343}: because{G3754} a{G3056} short{G4932} work{G3056} will{G4160} the Lord{G2962} make{G4160} upon{G1909} the earth{G3588}.

And{G2532} as{G2531} Esaias{G2268} said before{G4280}, Except{G3361} the Lord{G2962} of Sabaoth{G4519} had left{G1459} us{G2254} a seed{G4690}, we had been{G1096} as{G5613} Sodoma{G4670}, and{G2532} been made like{G3666} unto Gomorrha{G1116}.

What{G5101} shall we say{G2046} then{G3767}? That{G3754} the Gentiles{G1484}, which followed{G1377} not{G3361} after{G1377} righteousness{G1343}, have attained to{G2638} righteousness{G1343}, even{G1161} the righteousness{G1343} which is{G3588} of{G1537} faith{G4102}.
But{G1161} Israel{G2474}, which followed after{G1377} the law{G3551} of righteousness{G1343}, hath{G5348} not{G3756} attained{G5348} to{G1519} the law{G3551} of righteousness{G1343}
